document_data.name: Hannah bint Alurah
document_data.siblings: [[Anjar bin Alurah]], [[Omar bin Alurah]], [[Raman bin Alurah min-Najm]], [[Alurah bint Alurah]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Hannah bint Alurah''' was a [[paladin]] and princess of [[Hiyal]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Considered by many to be the white sheep of the royal family, Hannah was both caring and considerate. Because of her siblings' manipulations, Hannah was inherently suspicious, bordering on hostile, toward strangers.
document_data.Activities: Hannah was the Marshall of the City Guard. As a whole, the citizens of Hiyal admired Hannah's just demeanor and quest to keep the city in order.
document_data.Relationships: Hannah was the daughter of Sultana [[Alurah bint Asrah]]. She feared her mother would pass away without naming an heir, plunging the city into chaos.
